attributes.action: The government's mishandling of the real science around Coronaviruses
attributes.additional_details:
It is for the benefit and wellbeing of each UK citizen.
The present actions using tiers and lockdowns, which do not protect us from coronaviruses, also means each citizen is not taking self-responsibility for their own wellbeing.
If you wish to enhance the wellbeing of each citizen and boost the UK economy then allow each MP to work proactively in their constituent.
Build a healthy workforce, which using local farmers and local businesses. Viruses are us and we are them!
attributes.background: Understand more about Coronaviruses and how they function in humans. Viruses upregulate our genes, however if people have a compromised immune system, then viruses can overwhelm our body. It is about each citizen taking radical responsibility for their physical, mental, social and emotional body.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
